name: Suicide Run
overview: Suicide Run is a side view horizontal shooter where the screen scrolls left to right constantly, and your aim is to fly over the surface of Mars moving your spacecraft up or down. As you fly, you will encounter missiles flying upwards as well as asteroids sitting still in the sky and these must be shot or avoided. If you are hit by anything as well as hitting the surface of Mars then you lose one of three lives. You are able to shoot forwards as well as bomb and there are fuel dumps that can be destroyed for extra points.
